task.summary: Initial commit for EMOH SOCKET CLIENT.
Defines Device super-class, creates MQTTException class and implements first sequence approach.
Fixes several issues regarding the mqtt callback functions
Removes wiringPi from required libraries as it should be installed prior
Removes MQTT and RCSwitch from required libraries

MESSAGE.value: Initial commit for EMOH SOCKET CLIENT.
Defines Device super-class, creates MQTTException class and implements first sequence approach.
Fixes several issues regarding the mqtt callback functions
Removes wiringPi from required libraries as it should be installed prior
Removes MQTT and RCSwitch from required libraries
